decision_conditions: DES No structures on roof terr approved
DES External soil pipes painted black
DES No flues etc fixed to elevations
LB Ext & Int works to match existing
LBC works in accord with apprvd plans
+1 DES Detail of facing materials submit
LB Sample panels of brickwk submit
description: Variation of Condition 1 of listed building consent dated 19th July 2018 (RN: 18/02362/LBC) for, 'Demolition of rear facade of Nos. 96-98 Baker Street and front and part rear facades of No. 14 Sherlock Mews, use of first to fourth floors of Nos. 96-98 Baker Street as eight residential flats (Class C3), amalgamation of flats at first and second floors of No. 14 Sherlock Mews into a maisonette (Class C3), erection of replacement shopfronts to Baker Street facade, erection of replacement rear facade to Nos. 96-98 Baker Street, erection of replacement front facade to No. 14 Sherlock Mews, alterations at roof level, and other associated external alterations'; NAMELY, (i) Amendments to the design of the main door of the residential entrance at the Baker Street front elevation; (ii) Amendment to the material finish of the residential entrance to the building at the Baker Street front elevation; (iii) Internal layout changes to 1st - 4th floor flats at 96-98 Baker Street; (iv) Reconfigured exhaust shaft for theatre at 1st floor terrace to the Baker Street rear elevation; (v) Modification to bedroom windows at the Baker Street rear elevation to accommodate exhaust shaft for theatre; (vi) Revised location of access hatch to roof; (vii) Reduced area for clerestory pop-up at Baker Street rear elevation; (viii) Addition of a guard rail at roof level; and (ix) Introduction of external pipework to the Baker Street rear elevation.
